Bash(git -C /Users/broneotodak/Projects/flowstate-ai commit -m "Fix Netlify secrets detection with NEXT_PUBLIC prefix

- Changed env vars to use NEXT_PUBLIC_ prefix
- Updated build.sh to use new variable names

Netlify recognizes NEXT_PUBLIC_ prefix as intentionally public variables

Bash(# Move shared components
mv src/components/PageLayout.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/AccessLevelSwitcher.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/ThemeToggle.jsx src/shared/components/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv src/components/LoadingSpinner.jsx src/shared/components/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv src/components/ErrorBoundary.jsx src/shared/components/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move all contexts to shared
mv src/contexts/* src/shared/contexts/

# Move core files
mv src/lib/* src/core/lib/
mv src/config/* src/core/config/

echo ""âœ… Moved shared and core files"")

Bash(# Keep only the main Dashboard.jsx
rm src/pages/DashboardOld.jsx
mv src/pages/Dashboard.jsx src/shared/components/

# Move remaining shared utils
ls src/utils/)

Bash(# Move remaining utils to shared
mv src/utils/accessLevelUtils.js src/shared/utils/

# Move any remaining services that should be module-specific
ls src/services/)

Bash(# Move AI services to shared (used across modules)
mv src/services/aiService.js src/shared/services/
mv src/services/aiServiceLocal.js src/shared/services/
mv src/services/aiServiceSecure.js src/shared/services/
mv src/services/multiAIService.js src/shared/services/

# Move organization service to employees module
mv src/services/organizationService.js src/modules/employees/services/

# Move other shared services
mv src/services/notificationService.js src/shared/services/
mv src/services/secureStorageService.js src/shared/services/
mv src/services/sofiaInsightsService.js src/shared/services/
mv src/services/storageService.js src/shared/services/

# Create services directory in shared if not exists
mkdir -p src/shared/services

echo ""âœ… Organized remaining services"")

Bash(# Create shared services directory first
mkdir -p src/shared/services

# Now move the services
mv src/services/*.js src/shared/services/

# Check what''s left in pages
ls src/pages/)

Bash(# Move admin/system pages to shared
mv src/pages/AdminSettings.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/pages/AuthCallback.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/pages/Login.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/pages/NotificationSettings.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/pages/Notifications.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/pages/CustomDashboard.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/pages/DataTest.jsx src/shared/components/

# Move leave-related pages to leave module
mv src/pages/LeaveApprovals.jsx src/modules/leave/pages/
mv src/pages/LeaveManagement.jsx src/modules/leave/pages/
mv src/pages/LeaveManagementSimple.jsx src/modules/leave/pages/

# Move employees-related pages
mv src/pages/AttendanceManagement.jsx src/modules/employees/pages/
mv src/pages/HRChangeRequests.jsx src/modules/employees/pages/
mv src/pages/Organizations.jsx src/modules/employees/pages/
mv src/pages/CreateAnnouncement.jsx src/modules/employees/pages/

# Move Claims directory
mv src/pages/Claims src/modules/claims/pages/

echo ""âœ… Organized remaining pages"")

Bash(# Remove empty old directories
rmdir src/pages 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/components/Dashboard 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/components 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/services 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/utils 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/hooks 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/contexts 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/lib 2>/dev/null || true
rmdir src/config 2>/dev/null || true

# Check what''s left
echo ""Remaining in src/:""
ls -la src/)

Bash(# Move remaining components to appropriate places
mv src/components/AIChat.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/AnnouncementBanner.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/DynamicViewRenderer.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/NotificationBell.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/SofiaFloatingButton.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/StatsCard.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/PerformanceDashboard.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/SignupFlow.jsx src/shared/components/
mv src/components/RecentActivities.jsx src/shared/components/

# Move employee-related components
mv src/components/EmployeeDocumentUpload.jsx src/modules/employees/components/
mv src/components/OrganizationDetailModal.jsx src/modules/employees/components/
mv src/components/OrganizationFilter.jsx src/modules/employees/components/
mv src/components/OrganizationsOverview.jsx src/modules/employees/components/
mv src/components/PhotoUpload.jsx src/modules/employees/components/

# Move leave-related
mv src/components/LeaveApprovalDialog.jsx src/modules/leave/components/

# Move payroll-related
mv src/components/PCBSettings.jsx src/modules/payroll/components/

# Move AdminSettings folder
mv src/components/AdminSettings src/shared/components/

echo ""âœ… Moved remaining components"")

Bash(# Fix Dashboard.jsx component imports
sed -i.bak -E ""s|from ''../../components/common/|from ''../components/common/|g"" src/shared/pages/Dashboard.jsx
sed -i.bak -E ""s|from ''../../components/employee/|from ''../components/employee/|g"" src/shared/pages/Dashboard.jsx
sed -i.bak -E ""s|from ''../../components/tasks/|from ''../components/tasks/|g"" src/shared/pages/Dashboard.jsx

sed -i.bak -E ""s|from ''../../components/layout/|from ''../components/layout/|g"" src/shared/pages/Dashboard.jsx

# Check the changes
grep -n ""from ''\.\./components"" src/shared/pages/Dashboard.jsx | head -10)
